Text: Americans burn about 400 million gallons of gasoline a day, so a 25 cent increase would cost consumers about $100 million a day.
Cause: Americans burn about 400 million gallons of gasoline a day
Effect: a 25 cent increase would cost consumers about $100 million a day.
